header: Hello and welcome to my website! My name is Brandon and I'm a student at the University of Pittsburgh, pursuing a career in software development.
basketball: Basketball is my favorite sport! I've been playing since I could walk.
telescope: I love astronomy and have photographed the moon, several planets, and other celestial wonders with my telescope.
motorcycle: I've been riding and working on motorcycles since I was 18. I'm hoping to take a road trip from coast to coast in the next few years!
data: Data Science is one of my favorite fields. We live in an amazing time where we can use enormous data sets and modern methods to help solve problems such as climate change, disease propagation, and much more.
